titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Journal of geophysical research correspondence and article files, 1965-1969 MS 343
titlestmt.author: Lee Pecht and Sharon Link

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-01 21:31:11 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Journal of geophysical research correspondence and article files
did.abstract: This material was the working papers of the Journal of geophysical research during the period when Prof. Alexander J. Dessler (Space Science Dept., Rice University) was associate editor and later co-editor (1964-1970). It includes correspondence and article files.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Journal of Geophysical Research publishes original scientific research on the physical, chemical, and biological processes that contribute to the understanding of the Earth, Sun, and solar system and all of their environments and components.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This material was the working papers of the Journal of geophysical research during the period when Prof. Alexander J. Dessler (Space Science Dept., Rice University) was associate editor and later co-editor (1964-1970). It includes correspondence between Dessler, other editors, referees and authors. A folder for each article accepted or rejected for publication was usually prepared and assigned a number; this internal organization has been preserved.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Journal of geophysical research correspondence and article files must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was donated by Prof. Alexander Dessler.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Journal of geophysical research correspondence and article files, 1965-69, MS 343, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: See separate document for full listing of article files in box 1.
